actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: A resolution disapproving that portion of the family contribution schedule transmitted by the Secretary of Education to the Congress on March 13, 1981.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval by the House of Representatives of specified regulations submitted by the Secretary of Education with respect to family contribution schedules under the Higher Education Act of 1965. Returns such regulations to the Secretary to be modified or otherwise disposed of as provided in such Act.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving that portion of the family contribution schedule transmitted by the Secretary of Education to the Congress on March 13, 1981.
